Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus FDA209P (MIC=14.9 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC>64 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Nonterminal Modifications and Unusual Am: Disulfide bond between Cys27 and Cys33.
Sequence Information.Predicted Structure: There is no predicted structure for DRAMP01909.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of novel antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretion of Hylarana guentheri.
Literature.Author: Zhou J, McClean S, Thompson A, Zhang Y, Shaw C, Rao P, Bjourson AJ.
